name: Voyagers (itch) (Doriens)
description:
Our entry for the LMOB Beginner Jam #24.

!!! WEB VERSION HERE !!!!

I saw that some might have some trouble with the .rar, sor here a web version of the game: https://doriens.itch.io/voyager-web

(Special note: We found out that you can't read the text of the black enemy in the end. It says: "No, I need this ! GIVE IT BACK")

You are a lonely space adventurer who crashed into an asteriod.  And you are not alone...

Playing time: around 15 minutes.

(The game has the end screen implemented)

Control:

- Use A - D or Q - D to move

- Space to shift gravity (you have a 1s cooldown).

- When you slide, hold down the key in which direction you are going to accelerate. Esc to leave the game. Soundtrack and design is made by us.

This is our first game ever, so it was really fun (and exhausting...) to do all that in 1week ! And we are pretty pleased with our result :)

Everything was made by us in Unity, without assets.

Developper - Soundtrack - PixelArt: Adrien Dorise

Level design - PixelArt: Ronan Pons

Music and design are orignals.

https://soundcloud.com/user-564089708/moonwalker
